thread.title: Codelco says key Chuquicamata copper mine halted due to strike
thread.title_full: Codelco says key Chuquicamata copper mine halted due to strike | Reuters

author: Reuters
title: Codelco says key Chuquicamata copper mine halted due to strike
text:
SANTIAGO, July 28 World no.1 copper miner Codelco halted operations Tuesday at its key Chuquicamata mine as a week-long contract workers' strike intensified, chief executive Nelson Pizarro said.
The contract workers had blocked access roads to the project, he said. Chuquicamata produced 340,400 tonnes of copper in 2014. (Reporting by Fabian Cambero)
